thread.title: Umno more like North Korea, DAP MP strikes back
thread.title_full: Umno more like North Korea, DAP MP strikes back

title: Umno more like North Korea, DAP MP strikes back

locations.name: democratic people's republic of north korea

text:
DAP lawmaker Teresa Kok has criticised Umno leader Mohd Puad Zarkashi for comparing DAP to North Korea, claming that it is Umno which is similar to the iron-fisted regime. 
According to her, the Umno supreme council leader's statement was amusing but also "stupid and ridiculous". 
The Seputeh MP then outlined the differences between DAP and the Democratic People's Republic of North Korea (DPRK).
